name: Product Price Tracker
description: Tracks product prices and notifies you when prices drop

data_collection_permissions.description: This extension collects product information (URLs, names, prices, images) from pages you visit to track price changes. All data is stored locally in your browser and is never transmitted to external servers or third parties. The data is used solely to monitor price changes and send you notifications when prices drop.

data_collected.purpose: Track price changes on specific product pages
data_collected.retention: Stored locally until you remove the product from tracking

data_collected.purpose: Display product information in the extension interface
data_collected.retention: Stored locally until you remove the product from tracking

data_collected.purpose: Monitor price changes and calculate savings
data_collected.retention: Stored locally until you remove the product from tracking

data_collected.purpose: Display product images in the extension interface
data_collected.retention: Stored locally until you remove the product from tracking

data_collection_permissions.data_sharing: No data is shared with third parties or external servers. All data remains on your device.
data_collection_permissions.data_storage: All data is stored locally using browser.storage.local API
